item.text: In the second year of his reign Nebuchadnezzar had many dreams. His mind was disturbed, and he suffered from insomnia.
The king issued an order to summon the magicians, astrologers, sorcerers, and wise men in order to explain his dreams to him. So they came and awaited the king’s instructions.
The king told them, “I have had a dream, and I am anxious to understand the dream.”

The <st data-num="03778" class="">wise men</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">replied</st> to the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>: [What follows is in <st data-num="0762" class="">Aramaic</st><n id="1" />] “O <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>, <st data-num="02418" class="">live</st> <st data-num="05957" class="">forever</st>! <st data-num="0560" class="">Tell</st> your <st data-num="05649" class="">servants</st> the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st>, and we will <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> its<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>.”

The <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06032 0560">replied</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="03779" class="">wise men</st>, “My <st data-num="04406 04481">decision</st> <st data-num="0230" class="">is firm</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02006" class="">If</st> you do <st data-num="03809" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03046" class="">inform</st> me of both the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> and its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>, you will be <st data-num="01917 05648">dismembered</st><n id="3" /> and your <st data-num="01005" class="">homes</st> <st data-num="07761" class="">reduced</st> to <st data-num="05122" class="">rubble</st>!

But <st data-num="02006" class="">if</st> you can <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> and its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>, you will <st data-num="06902" class="">receive</st> <st data-num="04481 06925">from</st> me <st data-num="04978" class="">gifts</st>, a <st data-num="05023" class="">reward</st>, and <st data-num="07690" class="">considerable</st> <st data-num="03367" class="">honor</st>. <st data-num="02006" class="">So</st> <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> to me the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> and its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>.”

They <st data-num="08579" class="">again</st> <st data-num="06032 0560">replied</st>, “Let the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0560" class="">inform</st> <st data-num="05649" class="">us</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st>; then we will <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> its<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>.”

The <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06032 0560">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0576" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03046" class="">know</st> <st data-num="04481" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03330" class="">sure</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0608" class="">you</st> are attempting to <st data-num="02084" class="">gain</st> <st data-num="05732" class="">time</st>,<st data-num="03606 06903 01768"> because</st> you <st data-num="02370" class="">see</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> my <st data-num="04406">decision</st> <st data-num="0230 04481">is firm</st>.

If you don’t inform me of the dream, there is only one thing that is going to happen to you. For you have agreed among yourselves to report to me something false and deceitful until such time as things might change. So tell me the dream, and I will have confidence that you can disclose its interpretation.”

The wise men replied to the king, “There is no man on earth who is able to disclose the king’s secret, for no king, regardless of his position and power, has ever requested such a thing from any magician, astrologer, or wise man.
What the king is asking is too difficult, and no one exists who can disclose it to the king, except for the gods—but they don’t live among mortals!”
Because of this the king got furiously angry and gave orders to destroy all the wise men of Babylon.
So a decree went out, and the wise men were about to be executed. They also sought Daniel and his friends so that they could be executed.
Then Daniel spoke with prudent counsel to Arioch, who was in charge of the king’s executioners and who had gone out to execute the wise men of Babylon.

He <st data-num="06032 0560">inquired</st> of <st data-num="0746" class="">Arioch</st> the <st data-num="01768 04430">king’s</st> <st data-num="07990" class="">deputy</st>, “<st data-num="05922 04101">Why</st> is the <st data-num="01882" class="">decree</st> <st data-num="04481 06925">from</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> so <st data-num="02685" class="">urgent</st>?”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0116" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="0746" class="">Arioch</st> <st data-num="03046" class="">informed</st> <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> about the <st data-num="04406" class="">matter</st>.

So <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> <st data-num="05954" class="">went in</st> and<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01156 04481">requested</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">to</st> <st data-num="05415" class="">grant</st> him <st data-num="02166" class="">time</st>, that he might <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> the <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st> to the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>.

<st data-num="0116" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> <st data-num="0236" class="">went</st> to his <st data-num="01005" class="">home</st> and <st data-num="03046" class="">informed</st> his <st data-num="02269" class="">friends</st> <st data-num="02608" class="">Hananiah</st>, <st data-num="04333" class="">Mishael</st>, and <st data-num="05839" class="">Azariah</st> of the <st data-num="04406" class="">matter</st>.

He asked them to <st data-num="01156" class="">pray for</st> <st data-num="07359" class="">mercy</st> <st data-num="04481 06925">from</st> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="05922" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07328" class="">mystery</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="01841" class="">he</st><n id="1" /> and his <st data-num="02269" class="">friends</st> would <st data-num="03809" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="07" class="">destroyed</st> <st data-num="05974" class="">along with</st> the <st data-num="07606" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="02445" class="">wise men</st> of <st data-num="0895" class="">Babylon</st>.

<st data-num="0116" class="">Then</st> in a <st data-num="01768 03916">night</st> <st data-num="02376" class="">vision</st> the <st data-num="07328" class="">mystery</st> was <st data-num="01541" class="">revealed</st> to <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st>. <st data-num="0116" class="">So</st> <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> <st data-num="01289" class="">praised</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="08065" class="">heaven</st>,

saying:

“Let the name of God be praised forever and ever,

for wisdom and power belong to him.

He changes times and seasons,

deposing some kings

and establishing others.

He gives wisdom to the wise;

he imparts knowledge to those with understanding;

he reveals deep and hidden things.

He knows what is in the darkness,

and light resides with him.

O God of my fathers, I acknowledge and glorify you,

for you have bestowed wisdom and power on me.

Now you have enabled me to understand what we requested from you.

For you have enabled us to understand the king’s dilemma.”

Then Daniel went in to see Arioch (whom the king had appointed to destroy the wise men of Babylon). He came and said to him, “Don’t destroy the wise men of Babylon! Escort me to the king, and I will disclose the interpretation to him.”
So Arioch quickly ushered Daniel into the king’s presence, saying to him, “I have found a man from the captives of Judah who can make known the interpretation to the king.”

The <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> then <st data-num="06032 0560">asked</st> <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> (<st data-num="01768" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="08036" class="">name</st> was also <st data-num="01096" class="">Belteshazzar</st>), “<st data-num="0383" class="">Are</st> you <st data-num="03546" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="03046" class="">make known</st> to me the <st data-num="02493" class="">dream</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="02370" class="">saw</st>, as well as its <st data-num="06591" class="">interpretation</st>?”

<st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st> <st data-num="06032 0560">replied</st> <st data-num="06925" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>, “The <st data-num="07328" class="">mystery</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> is <st data-num="07593" class="">asking about</st> is such that <st data-num="03809" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02445" class="">wise men</st>, <st data-num="0826" class="">astrologers</st>, <st data-num="02749" class="">magicians</st>, or <st data-num="01505" class="">diviners</st> <st data-num="03202" class="">can possibly</st> <st data-num="02324" class="">disclose</st> it to the <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st>.

However, there is a God in heaven who reveals mysteries, and he has made known to King Nebuchadnezzar what will happen in the times to come. The dream and the visions you had while lying on your bed are as follows:
“As for you, O king, while you were in your bed your thoughts turned to future things. The revealer of mysteries has made known to you what will take place.

As for me, this mystery was revealed to me not because I possess more wisdom than any other living person, but so that the king may understand the interpretation and comprehend the thoughts of your mind.
“You, O king, were watching as a great statue—one of impressive size and extraordinary brightness—was standing before you. Its appearance caused alarm.

Its <st data-num="08243" class="">legs</st> were <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="06523" class="">iron</st>; its <st data-num="07271" class="">feet</st> were <st data-num="04481" class="">partly</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="06523" class="">iron</st> and <st data-num="04481" class="">partly</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="02635" class="">clay</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="03606 01768">Wherever</st> <st data-num="01123 0606">human beings</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01251" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02423" class="">animals</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05776" class="">birds</st> of the <st data-num="08065" class="">sky</st> <st data-num="01753" class="">live</st>—he has <st data-num="03052" class="">given</st> them into your <st data-num="03028" class="">power</st>.<n id="3" /> He has given you <st data-num="07981" class="">authority</st> over them <st data-num="03606" class="">all</st>. <st data-num="0607" class="">You</st> <st data-num="01932" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="07217" class="">head</st> <st data-num="01768" class="">of</st> <st data-num="01722" class="">gold</st>.

Then King Nebuchadnezzar bowed down with his face to the ground and paid homage to Daniel. He gave orders to offer sacrifice and incense to him.

The <st data-num="04430" class="">king</st> <st data-num="06032 0560">replied</st> to <st data-num="01841" class="">Daniel</st>, “<st data-num="04481 07187 01768">Certainly</st> your <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> <st data-num="01932" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="0426" class="">God</st> of <st data-num="0426" class="">gods</st> and <st data-num="04756" class="">Lord</st> of <st data-num="04430" class="">kings</st> and <st data-num="01541" class="">revealer</st> of <st data-num="07328" class="">mysteries</st>, <st data-num="01768" class="">for</st> you <st data-num="03202" class="">were able</st> to <st data-num="01541" class="">reveal</st> <st data-num="01836" class="">this</st> <st data-num="07328" class="">mystery</st>!”
